thread.title: Rio2 Limited To Buy Atacama Pacific Gold Corp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Rio2 Limited To Buy Atacama Pacific Gold Corp
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Rio2 Ltd:
* RIO2 LIMITED AND ATACAMA PACIFIC GOLD CORPORATION ANNOUNCE BUSINESS COMBINATION
* COMBINED COMPANY WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE UNDER NAME RIO2 LIMITED AND WILL BE MANAGED BY RIO2â€™S EXISTING EXECUTIVE TEAM
* RIO2-EACH ATACAMA PACIFIC SHAREHOLDER WILL GET 0.6601 SHARES OF COMBINED COMPANY , WHILE EACH RIO2 SHAREHOLDER WILL GET 0.6667 SHARES OF COMBINED CO
* ABOUT 42.5% OF COMBINED ENTITY WILL BE HELD BY FORMER RIO2 SHAREHOLDERS AND 57.5% HELD BY FORMER ATACAMA PACIFIC SHAREHOLDERS
* EXCHANGE RATIO REPRESENTS CONSIDERATION TO ATACAMA PACIFIC SHAREHOLDERS OF C$0.95 PER ATACAMA PACIFIC COMMON SHARE (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
